Blog.post: Ok ok ok, so i ment Micheal, duck. Not the best typer...? Will change it around.

who's matthew hedges? did you mean michael, goose? here's a link to matthew hedges' stuff (click on the title of this post). i particularly like the "Royal Space Force" painting. I am ordering it to put in a nice antique gold leaf frame above the Royal Space Bed. Con mucho gusto, El Fartadore
I love you too, man!

aaahhh. we're approaching the level of insanity i was hoping to witness. a couple of notches above absurd, but not quite full Flipp-surd. a couple more posts and we should be there. go Flippos! love you guys.
Oh, my god. Moms and my Profiles are one and the same!!! NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!

This happened to my friend Paul... Guess what cats? Something crazy to add to 'Paul just won't die' (knock on wood). Some punk-ass crackhead or whatever tried to car jack me during the paper route early this morning around 420. I had my foot on the brake and was checking the address of a cancelled paper i knew i had coming up in these apartments, and i had the dome light on so i didn't even see him coming or know he was there until the bastard had punched me in the face and was grabbing my steering wheel and was yelling at me to get out of the car. It was crazy....it happened fast and in all honestly, i'm glad i'm passive-aggressive. Cuz when that punk grabbed my steering wheel, i locked my hand on his, slammed on the gas, and dragged his ass into the middle of the next road before i let go, sending him rolling. Then i just took off. So yeah, i put in my leave to quit that job cuz they certainly don't pay me enough. Moral of the story is, crackheads suck, be careful at night always and for the love of god, drag 'em, run over 'em and damn them. But yeah, i'm straight except for a welt on my face and some bad mojo. Y'all take care...jeez...did i just type 'y'all'?? The south's gettin' to me....
You're the man, mom...
Noah-- Get your own username, guy! This is yo' Mama. And I MAY be half a century old--but at least I can blog!!! Neener, neener, neener.

Noah- Here are a couple of links for you. I just thought this would be a kind of neat way for us all to keep in touch. It stays archived, so you can always go back and read what has happened. I have also met some really interesting people over it. Explore some- it's a lot more fun than dragging crackheads down the street with your car... P.S. If you want to invite anyone to be a member let me know and I will put them on the list. DBAG urlLink Bloglink 1 urlLink Bloglink 2

This is noah and noah is sad because noah can't figure out what the ^#$*%#*%&^% is a blog, in addition Noah's Parents Tom and Judy who together make a century, Have!!!!!!!!!!! there is something wrong with the picture that is this!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ~N~

Tristan all of the sudden just got real sick yesterday. High Fever and everything. It might be the chicken pox... Today he was much better, but still had a fever. Strange stuff... So we just get to wait it out i guess... I actually picked up the guitar the other day... wuz fun. Working too much.
Ok people, almost got him out of those diapers! He's goin Pee Pee all the way home, doggie. I was in Th√ºringen all day yesterday in a Meeting and am dead tired. Whoa Pee Pee time!!! Gotta go! A
interstained.
Why am I reminded of the movie "Liar, Liar" where he calls the boss a "steaming pile of cow dung!" You guys deserve each other. MA
Man, that's where I came up with that great name, brutha. I'm forming a band. The Steamin' Heaps. Oh yes, those hot summer nights with the dung heap are rollin around...

Ok, if this goes on like this it's gonna be a reeeaaally boring BLOG. Come on people.
Ok, slow down guys... not everyone at once!!!
My first post on blogger. I hope that this becomes something that we can do often to keep up with each other.
I know in this day and age we don't all have the time we would like to, but I think we can do better than this... What's going on in everyone's lives right now? Love you all, Dbag
I love your name. I must admit, we had to think about it for a second, but then we got it. Let the games begin... Later Arkboy
I don't know i just like to make an entrance. never fear my blogger brothers after your short stint of boredom i am come to stay. lend me your ears for i wish to make soup. and i'm out.
